DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if providing parenting education materials delivered in different ways during the first 30 months of a child's life will increase child-parent attachment and promote mother-child interaction, if certain types of strategies improve cognitive, language, and emotional development in infants and toddlers, and if our way of delivering these materials is cost-effective.
DOC.criteria: Englishspeaking 1823 yearold firsttime mother of a healthy newborn Anything other than above
